EmailTemplate.subject: Weekly Update 8th March, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
I'd like to kick off the Update today by wishing all the lovely mums and women a happy and joyous International Women's Day.
Now for the news......
1. Parents Vs Teachers Basketball Challenge:-
When:- Saturday 10th March, 2012 Where:- Upper School Gym Time:- 10.30am arrival for 11.00am Tip-Off.
The parents team has been busy training for the Challenge, but are still needing 2 or 3 to round off the team......so if you're interested please contact me at (admissions@internationalschool.ru) to register.
If you would like to come down and cheer on your favorite teacher or Dad/Mum, you're also welcome......plenty of refreshments and snacks will be available on the day.
2. Wine Tasting Event:-
Please be reminded that the deadline for confirmation for the wine tasting event is tomorrow, however, since today and tomorrow is a public holiday we might be able to extend this date.
3. Parking for Today:-
Could I please advise all Parents and Drivers collecting children from school today, that it is a Russian Public Holiday today and the Ice Palace across the road will be packed, thus limiting greatly the parking space around school. Please drive slowly and safely!!!
